page.title: 15Ufton Public Transport.
page.content: Altogether there are 17 bus services that go through Ufton from Leamington and there are 24 services via Ufton that go to Leamington.On school days only there are 3 services either way. The bus service that goes either way through Ufton also goes through Radford Semele,{UFTON},Harbury,Bishops Itchington,Offchurch,Long Itchington, Southam,Stockton,Napton,Priors Hardwick and arrives in Priors Marston. The service to Leamington runs the other way. On Saturdays only,there are 4 services from Leamington and 6 to Leamington. Most people find the bus service adequate.Others don't use the bus either because they find it inadequate or they have their own transport.
